# ArrayExtensions.SliceArray&lt;T&gt; method

Slice array

```csharp
public static IEnumerable<T[]> SliceArray<T>(this T[] source, int maxResultElements)
```

| parameter | description |
| --- | --- |
| T | Element array type |
| source | Target array |
| maxResultElements | Max elements for sub-arrays |

## Return Value

Returns a new array that contains the new array content.
